install.description: This plugin enables you to add link to manage the subscription of the user

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: unsubscribetemplate
param.label: Display the unsubscribe page
param.description: Select if you want to display the unsubscribe page (when the user clicks on the unsubscribe link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: modifytemplate
param.label: Display the modify your subscription
param.description: Select if you want to display the modify your subscription page (when the user clicks on the modify you subscription link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template

param.name: confirmtemplate
param.label: Display the confirmation page
param.description: Select if you want to display the confirmation page (when the user clicks on the confirmation link) without any Joomla module (no template) or inside your default Joomla Template
